snippet.title: Sonic & SEGA All-Stars Racing - Android Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Sonic and the SEGA All-Stars zoom onto your Android or tablet for the ultimate racing showdown!

Now live on Google Play for Android Devices, Sonic & SEGA All-Stars lets you take control of your favorite character in their own unique vehicle, as you blast across 16 courses in a frantic race to the finish line.

Dodge traps, fire missiles, and if all else fails, unleash your All-Star moves! Race on your own or battle it out with friends -- now on the go and on your Android!

FEATURES:

- Meet the All-Stars -
Race to the finish as one of 13 iconic SEGA characters and take to the track by car, monster truck, bike, plane and even a banana! Each vehicle has unique handling characteristics, and each character's All-Star move will speed you to victory!

- Start Your Engines -
Rev up your skills with 25 missions then outrun the competition in four Grand Prix Cups or take on other racers in dueling Battle Mode!

- Victory Lap -
Earn achievements, race your way to the top of the leaderboards, and battle it out with up to three other players in online multiplayer!

Get it right now on Google Play - http://bit.ly/19kFa0V
